info.name: Photo Frames
info.summary: Turn any screen with a browser into a neat photo frame
info.description:
Generate easily sharable photo frame URLs for your nextcloud albums.
The possiblities are endless:
- Turn any android device into a smart photo frame (with the help of a kiosk browser) - Co-create photo frames with nextcloud's collaborative albums - Share photo frames across households
